name: Unlit - Demo
description:
This is the demo version. Download full version here: https://loopinteractive.itch.io/unlit

Imagine a world without light. A world that's unlit. The key is to not lose hope and defeat darkness while you still can. 

Amazing gameplay Stunning graphics Controls: Keyboard/Mouse:
  • Space to shoot light balls.
  • Click to move the light source and move mouse to change direction.
  • Right click to store light in lamp.
